results.name: a(n) = 2^j if n is of the form 2^i - 2^j with i > j, and 0 otherwise.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..65537
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
program: A340375(n) = if(n<5, 1, n>>=valuation(n, 2); n++; n>>valuation(n, 2)==1); \\ After function "is" given in A023758
xref: Cf. A023758 (after its initial zero, gives the positions nonzero terms).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 13 2021
